column4: Hi everyone, since we moved our pcs at work over to ubuntu, I was now woundring if there was a pice of GPL software that would allow me to create my staff rotas on that could be web/intranet based, have searched but can seem to only find windows stuff, Any Ideas??
its a rota is what you use to set shifts for staff, so everyone knows what time they start work and finish work
oh, you could use openoffice to create a database and have users open the file from a network share. Let me find you an example.
